title: Cucumber kimchi
ingredients: ['5 cucumbers, peeled and cut into 1x3cm sticks', '125g sea salt', '100g caster sugar', '125ml white vinegar', '250ml water', '2 tablespoons chilli bean sauce (toban djan)', '1 tablespoon hot chilli oil', '2 (10cm) fresh hot red chillies, sliced', '1 small onion, sliced', '5 cloves garlic, sliced and crushed']
